message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $12,000 is too low for me. This product is worth a significant investment, and I believe a price closer to my initial offer reflects its true value. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,000?
I understand your position, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $12,500. I believe this is a fair compromise between our previous offers.
